title: Opening

author: Craig A. Knoblock, Information Sciences Institute (ISI), University of Southern California
Antonio Bahamonde, Artificial Intelligence Center, University of Oviedo at Gijón
Beatriz López Ibáñez, Department of Electrical, Electronic and Automatic Engineering, University of Girona

segmentation: In the name of the Catalan Association for Artificial Intelligence.
Thank you, Professor Knoblock, for inviting us to this opening ceremony.
The Catalan Association for Artificial Intelligence represents a small country but with a high density of research groups dedicated to artificial intelligence.
Up to 26 research groups spread in about 20 two universities and research centers.
Our research goes from a basic students to experimental work on.
Our progress is regularly published by iOS press as the results of our annual meeting.
In addition, we contribute to several conference, such as each K, its kind, and of course, the journals.
The quality of the research groups and people is very well known, and in fact you are here due to the activity or high quality research members of our Association.
Most of us have relationships with other research groups around the world, and having all of you here at home, it is an honor and a non valuable opportunity to strengthen our relationships.
This is not only about our research, it is also about showing you our country, culture and people.
We hope that you will be more convinced about our Association influence.
If some of you still do not know us, I invite you to visit our stand and to enjoy the conference with all of our members.
Meanwhile, it is a pleasure to welcome you here in this emblematic building of Catalan culture.
Have a nice conference.
Guardiola conferencia.
It is now my pleasure to introduce Antonio Bahamonde, who is the president of Ipea, to say a few words on behalf of the Spanish AI Association.
Thank you.
It's a real pleasure for me to welcome you in the name of the Spanish Association of Artificial Intelligence.
In the first place, I would like to thank the people involved in the organization of the 8K.
The most important AI conference in the world.
In particular, I would like to thank the world down by Craig Knoblock, Toby Walls, and Carla Sierra.
For the efforts to produce a perfect.
Each guy organization and for the choice of this wonderful place for the opening ceremony.
Let me say a few words about my Association.
It was created in 1983.
And we are an active member of the UK.
The European Common Coordinating Committee for Artificial Intelligence in the last year we are successful in with our candidates in order to get recognized as a key fellows.
On the other hand.
Our Association contribute to the creation of the Evil American Association for Artificial Intelligence too.
Speaking about the activities of the of the Association, they can be described in three different lines of work.
First, we support economically our junglers, researchers with grants for major conference like it K or a key or relevant summer courses.
We also over the best final works.
Of post graduate students in AI, the second activity is the organization of biennial conference.
This year the 14th conference will be held in Tenerife.
Aim in the beautiful Canary Islands the next November.
This is an open conference for everybody and we invite all of you to participate in our national conferences.
The third branch of our activity is a new Journal.
We're going to launch a new Journal published by Springer, Progress in Artificial Intelligence.
The Journal will be published in cooperation with the Portuguese Association.
The aim is to publish top level research results in all aspects of artificial intelligence, both theoretical and practical issues.
We wait for your papers.
Just a final idea to close my speech.
It is important to recall here that according to the data of the Spanish research agencies, about 65% of the grants for developing research projects in computer science can be included in AI.
Does AI is by far the most active research area in this contest in Spain.
Let me claim to whom it may confirm that in the present crisis situation it is of course important to increase or less to maintain the financial support for this area.
I hope you enjoy.
They stay in this beautiful city of Barcelona, Catalonia, and the rest of Spain.
Thank you very much for your present.
I wish you a successful econference.
Thank you very much.
